example.name: autogen1
example.text: Mr. Cathcart , who will return to the Quaker Oats Co. board of directors , in addition to his personal ventures , is credited with bringing some basic budgeting and planning discipline to traditionally free-wheeling Kidder .
example.arg: Mr. Cathcart , who will return to the Quaker Oats Co. board of directors ---> *-1 ---> *-3
